post.title: KCPR Pledge Week
post.text:
PLEDGE WEEK begins today and continues until Sunday, May 26! Now is the time to support your favorite San Luis Obispo Area community radio station. Not only will you feel accomplished supporting our operations, you can score unique Pledge Week 2013 gear. Donations are conveniently accepted through PayPal this year, so check out all the information on the pledge page!

This year we're raising money for general maintenence and a remote broadcasting system for live shows, interviews, and stuff.

Donate and you will get KCPR gear, personalized love messages, mix CDs, or a tour of our station and guest spot on a show of your choice! Thanks, from the DJs at KCPR, for keeping us going.

Keep radio, music, Cal Poly, San Luis Obispo, and the world RAMPED!
